title: Barry Lyndon
creator_credit: Hawk Films, Peregrine, Warner Bros. Pictures, Stanley Kubrick, Ulla-Britt Söderlund, Milena Canonero and Ken Adam
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1975
brief_description: An Irish rogue uses his cunning and wit to work his way up the social classes of 18th century England, transforming himself from the humble Redmond Barry into the noble Barry Lyndon.

constellations_other.name: Painting pictures
constellations_other.description: Painter and photographer Louis Le Prince was inspired to develop the technology to make animated pictures by the circular panoramic paintings of his friends. His films captured everyday life and alluded to his artistic vision for cinema.
